action.action-desc: Mr. Hastings introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To repeal the provisions of the Protection of Lawful Commerce in Arms Act prohibiting the bringing of qualified civil liability actions in Federal or State court.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Gun Manufacturers Accountability Act.

section.header: Repeal of prohibition on bringing qualified civil liability actions in Federal or State court
section.text: Sections 2 through 4 of the Protection of Lawful Commerce in Arms Act (15 U.S.C. 7901–7903; Public Law 109–92) are hereby repealed.
